about_the_game:
Inochi Creator is a 2D rigging tool which is designed for game development and VTubing. With Inochi Creator you can animate illustrations, visual novel portraits, and either export video animations for posting on the internet; or export our INP interchange format for use in video games.

Inochi Creator is entirely open source and our free SDK is under a BSD 2-clause license, so you can use your creations in your games and multimedia projects without any licensing restrictions!
detailed_description:
Inochi Creator is a 2D rigging tool which is designed for game development and VTubing. With Inochi Creator you can animate illustrations, visual novel portraits, and either export video animations for posting on the internet; or export our INP interchange format for use in video games.

Inochi Creator is entirely open source and our free SDK is under a BSD 2-clause license, so you can use your creations in your games and multimedia projects without any licensing restrictions!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or newer
  • Processor: 64-bit Processor with SSE2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.1 compliant graphics processor
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or newer
  • Processor: 64-bit Processor with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Models take additional disk space, the bigger the model you have the more you'll need.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1 or 64 bit Intel CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.1 compliant graphics processor
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1 or 64 bit Intel CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.1 compliant graphics processor
  • Additional Notes: Models take additional disk space, the bigger the model you have the more you'll need.

name: Inochi Creator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 64-bit Processor with SSE2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.1 compliant graphics processor
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 64-bit Processor with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Models take additional disk space, the bigger the model you have the more you'll need. NVIDIA GPU is recommended for Spout2 support.

short_description: Bring your artwork to life with Inochi Creator, the open source animation suite!
supported_languages: English, German, Danish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Italian
